price: 72. Zeg: “Wellicht is dat wat jullie wensen te bespoedigen vlak achter jullie.”
arabic: قُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qul ʿasā an yakūna radifa lakum baʿḍu alladhī tastaʿjilūna
